resources.string:
Hi, my name is Leon 

I love to ride my bike and i am a passionate programmer and business man. 

As of right now I am still at the beginning of my journey through life, 

and i have no clue where it will lead me to. I am looking forward to 

many exciting things that I will do eventually. 

I have two siblings, they are called Leandra and Laurin. Both of them are around 10 years younger than I am, and they are very lovely. Both of them still attend elementary school. 

This year I will graduate from technical college in Leonding.
